page.title: 17Jobs
page.content: {Jobs.}People work in{shops,houses,}in their own time,{in the forest}and for {people.}Sally Smith 8.Work is found in {offices, banks}and the{school}.Karen Gould 8.Work is in the{fire}and{police stations,the{Forestry Commission}and {farms .}There are 7 houses given over to {old people }and many families take in tourists for {bed and breakfast.}No teachers at the school live in the villages but the secretary, caretaker, assistant cook, kitchen helper ,dinner ladies,'lollypop lady'( who stops the traffic to let the children cross the road ) do.{Garages}are manned by local people,as are{the local churches. There is an {undertaker}in the village but the two graveyards take no more burials, the dead are cremated in Southampton. A large number of residents{leave the village at 8 a.m. find work and{return at 6 p.m.
